00054 void DevPackage::Init()
00055 {
00056     _PackageName = wxT("MyPackage");
00057     _PackageVersion = wxT("1.0");
00058     _PackageVersionName = _PackageName + wxT(" Version ") + _PackageVersion;
00059     _MenuName = wxEmptyString;
00060     _PackageDescription = wxEmptyString;
00061     _URL = wxEmptyString;
00062     _Readme = wxEmptyString;
00063     _LicenseText = wxEmptyString;
00064     _Picture = wxEmptyString;
00065     _Dependencies = wxEmptyString;
00066     _Reboot = false;
00067     _SupportExtendedFormat = false;
00068     _PackagerName = wxEmptyString;
00069     _PackagerEmail = wxEmptyString;
00070     _FileList.Clear();
00071     _IconList.Clear();
00072 }

00074 void DevPackage::LoadFromPackageFile(wxFileConfig * PackageFile, const wxString& FileName)
00075 {    
00076     if(PackageFile)
00077     {
00078         //Clear the existing contents
00079         Clear();
00080         
00081         PackageFile->SetPath(SETUP_SECTION);
00082         _SupportExtendedFormat = !PackageFile->Read(wxT("SubVersion"), wxT("")).IsEmpty();
00083         _PackageName = PackageFile->Read(wxT("AppName"), wxT(""));
00084         _PackageVersionName = PackageFile->Read(wxT("AppVerName"), wxT(""));
00085         _PackageVersion = PackageFile->Read(wxT("AppVersion"), wxT(""));
00086         _MenuName = PackageFile->Read(wxT("MenuName"), wxT(""));
00087 
00088         _PackageDescription = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Description"), wxT(""));
00089         _URL = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Url"), wxT(""));
00090         _Readme = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Readme"), wxT(""));
00091         _LicenseText = PackageFile->Read(wxT("License"), wxT(""));
00092         _Picture = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Picture"), wxT(""));
00093         _Dependencies = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Dependencies"), wxT(""));
00094         PackageFile->Read(wxT("Reboot"), &_Reboot, false);
00095         
00096         if(_SupportExtendedFormat)
00097         {
00098             PackageFile->SetPath(EXTENDED_SETUP_SECTION);
00099             _PackagerName = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Packager"), wxT(""));
00100             _PackagerEmail = PackageFile->Read(wxT("Email"), wxT(""));
00101         }
00102 
00103         wxArrayString Files;
00104         wxString Str;
00105         long dummy;
00106         PackageFile->SetPath(FILES_SECTION);
00107         bool bCont = PackageFile->GetFirstEntry(Str, dummy);
00108         while ( bCont )
00109         {
00110             Files.Add(Str);
00111 
00112             bCont = PackageFile->GetNextEntry(Str, dummy);
00113         }
00114 
00115         for(size_t i = 0; i < Files.GetCount(); i++)
00116         {
00117             FileInfo TempFileInfo;
00118             TempFileInfo.SetSourceName(Files[i]);
00119             wxString TempString = PackageFile->Read(Files[i],wxT(""));
00120             //Set flag property to all characters after the first ';'
00121             TempFileInfo.SetOptionalFlags(TempString.AfterFirst(';'));
00122             wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00123             wxFileName TempSourceName(Files[i]);
00124             TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00125             //Check if the local file is a directory
00126             TempFileInfo.SetIsDirectory(wxDirExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()));
00127             //If it is a directory then set the destination name
00128             if(TempFileInfo.GetIsDirectory())
00129             {
00130                 TempFileInfo.SetDestinationDirectory(TempString.BeforeFirst(';'));
00131             }
00132             //If it is not a directory see if we need to give it a different name
00133             else
00134             {
00135                 wxString FileNameString = TempString;
00136                 //Strip off the <..> macro
00137                 FileNameString = FileNameString.AfterFirst('>');
00138                 //String off the flags
00139                 FileNameString = FileNameString.BeforeFirst(';');
00140                 wxFileName DestFileName(FileNameString);
00141                 TempFileInfo.SetDestinationName(DestFileName.GetFullName());
00142                 TempFileInfo.SetDestinationDirectory(TempString.substr(0,TempString.Find(DestFileName.GetFullName())));
00143             }
00144             _FileList.Add(TempFileInfo);
00145         }
00146 
00147 
00148         PackageFile->SetPath(ICONS_SECTION);
00149         Files.Clear();
00150         bCont = PackageFile->GetFirstEntry(Str, dummy);
00151         while ( bCont )
00152         {
00153             Files.Add(Str);
00154 
00155             bCont = PackageFile->GetNextEntry(Str, dummy);
00156         }
00157 
00158         for(size_t i = 0; i < Files.GetCount(); i++)
00159         {
00160             IconInfo TempIconInfo;
00161             TempIconInfo.SetMenuEntryName(Files[i]);
00162             wxString TempString = PackageFile->Read(Files[i],wxT(""));
00163             TempIconInfo.SetMenuEntryTarget(TempString.BeforeLast(','));
00164             if(TempString.Find(',') != wxNOT_FOUND)
00165                 TempIconInfo.SetOptionalIcon(TempString.AfterLast(','));
00166             _IconList.Add(TempIconInfo);
00167         }
00168     }
00169 }

00171 //This function is needed because the version of Packman that comes with Dev-C++
00172 //fails when reading a config file without a new line at the start. So we can't
00173 //just use wxFileConfig to write the file back
00174 const wxString DevPackage::WritePackageFileToString()
00175 {
00176     wxString TempString;
00177 
00178     TempString << wxT("\n[Setup]\n");
00179     TempString << wxT("Version=") << DEVPAK_VERSION << wxT("\n");
00180     if(_SupportExtendedFormat)
00181     {
00182         TempString << wxT("SubVersion=") << DEVPAK_SUBVERSION << wxT("\n");
00183     }
00184     TempString << wxT("AppName=") << _PackageName << wxT("\n");
00185 
00186     TempString << wxT("AppVerName=") << _PackageVersionName << wxT("\n");
00187     TempString << wxT("AppVersion=") << _PackageVersion << wxT("\n");
00188     TempString << wxT("MenuName=") << _MenuName << wxT("\n");
00189 
00190     TempString << wxT("Description=") << _PackageDescription << wxT("\n");
00191     TempString << wxT("Url=") << _URL << wxT("\n");
00192     TempString << wxT("Readme=") << _Readme << wxT("\n");
00193     TempString << wxT("License=") << _LicenseText << wxT("\n");
00194     TempString << wxT("Picture=") << _Picture << wxT("\n");
00195     TempString << wxT("Dependencies=") << _Dependencies << wxT("\n");
00196     TempString << wxT("Reboot=") << _Reboot << wxT("\n");
00197 
00198 
00199     if(_SupportExtendedFormat)
00200     {
00201         TempString << wxT("\n[ExtendedSetup]\n");
00202         TempString << wxT("Packager=") << _PackagerName << wxT("\n");
00203         TempString << wxT("Email=") << _PackagerEmail << wxT("\n");
00204         TempString << wxT("PathFormat=") << PATH_FORMAT << wxT("\n");
00205     }
00206         
00207     if(!_FileList.IsEmpty())
00208     {
00209         TempString << wxT("\n[Files]\n");
00210 
00211         for(size_t i = 0; i < _FileList.GetCount(); i++)
00212         {
00213             TempString << _FileList[i].GetSourceName() << wxT("=") << _FileList[i].GetDestinationDirectory() << _FileList[i].GetDestinationName();
00214             if(!_FileList[i].GetOptionalFlags().IsEmpty())
00215             {
00216                 TempString << wxT(";") << _FileList[i].GetOptionalFlags();
00217             }
00218             TempString << wxT("\n");
00219         }
00220     }
00221 
00222     if(!_IconList.IsEmpty())
00223     {
00224         TempString << wxT("\n[Icons]\n");
00225 
00226         for(size_t i = 0; i < _IconList.GetCount(); i++)
00227         {
00228             TempString << _IconList[i].GetMenuEntryName() << _IconList[i].GetMenuEntryTarget();
00229             if(!_IconList[i].GetOptionalIcon().IsEmpty())
00230             {
00231                 TempString << wxT(",") << _IconList[i].GetOptionalIcon();
00232             }
00233             TempString << wxT("\n");
00234         }
00235     }
00236     
00237     return TempString;
00238 }

00240 bool DevPackage::BuildPackage(const wxString& FileName, BuildForm * buildForm, bool Silent)
00241 {
00242     bool RetVal = true;
00243     
00244     wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00245     const int BufferSize = 1024*32;
00246 
00247     //Make TAR
00248     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("tar"));
00249     wxFileOutputStream out(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00250     wxTarOutputStream TarStream(out);
00251 
00252     if(!Silent && buildForm)
00253     {
00254         buildForm->WxStaticBox1->SetLabel(wxT(" Building tar archive... "));
00255         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetRange((_FileList.GetCount() +1) *2);
00256         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(1);
00257     }
00258 
00259     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPackage"));
00260     //Add the file name to tar.PutNextEntry
00261     TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempFileName.GetFullName());
00262     //Added to test
00263     wxStringInputStream TempInputStringStream(WritePackageFileToString());
00264     TarStream.Write(TempInputStringStream);
00265     //Send data into tar
00266 
00267     wxString TempCWD = wxGetCwd();
00268     {
00269         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00270         wxSetWorkingDirectory(TempFileName.GetPath());
00271     }
00272 
00273     for(size_t i = 0; i < _FileList.GetCount();i++)
00274     {
00275         if(_FileList[i].GetIsDirectory())
00276         {
00277             wxArrayString sl;
00278             wxDir::GetAllFiles(_FileList[i].GetSourceName(),&sl);
00279             TarStream.PutNextDirEntry(_FileList[i].GetSourceName());
00280             wxString CurrentDir = _FileList[i].GetSourceName();
00281             for(size_t j = 0; j < sl.GetCount();j++)
00282             {
00283                 if(wxDir::Exists(sl[j]))
00284                 {
00285                     //Add the file name to tar.PutNextDirEntry
00286                     TarStream.PutNextDirEntry(sl[j]);
00287                 }
00288                 else
00289                 {
00290                     wxFileName CurrentFileName(sl[j]);
00291 
00292                     wxFileInputStream InputFile(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00293                     if(InputFile.IsOk())
00294                     {
00295                         //Add the file name to tar.PutNextEntry
00296                         TarStream.PutNextEntry(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00297                         //Send data into tar
00298                         TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00299                     }
00300                 }
00301             }
00302         }
00303         else
00304         {
00305             wxFileName CurrentFileName(_FileList[i].GetSourceName());
00306 
00307             wxFileInputStream InputFile(CurrentFileName.GetFullPath());
00308             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00309             {
00310                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00311                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(CurrentFileName.GetFullName());
00312                 //Send data into zip;
00313                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00314             }
00315         }
00316         if(!Silent && buildForm)
00317         {
00318             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue() + 1);
00319         }
00320     }
00321 
00322     if(_Readme.IsEmpty())
00323     {
00324         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00325         wxFileName TempSourceName(_Readme);
00326         TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00327         if(wxFileExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()))
00328         {
00329             wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
00330             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00331             {
00332                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00333                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempSourceName.GetFullName());
00334                 //Send data into zip;
00335                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00336             }
00337         }
00338         else
00339         {
00340             if(!Silent)
00341             {
00342                 if(wxMessageBox(wxT("Your readme file doesn't exist. Do you want to abort the creation of the package?"), wxT("File Error...") , wxICON_ERROR|wxYES|wxNO) == wxID_YES)
00343                     return false;
00344                 else
00345                     RetVal = false;
00346             }
00347         }
00348     }
00349 
00350     if(_LicenseText.IsEmpty())
00351     {
00352         wxFileName TempFileName(FileName);
00353         wxFileName TempSourceName(_LicenseText);
00354         TempSourceName.MakeAbsolute(TempFileName.GetPath());
00355         if(wxFileExists(TempSourceName.GetFullPath()))
00356         {
00357             wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempSourceName.GetFullPath());
00358             if(InputFile.IsOk())
00359             {
00360                 //Add the file name to zip.PutNextEntry
00361                 TarStream.PutNextEntry(TempSourceName.GetFullName());
00362                 //Send data into zip;
00363                 TarStream.Write(InputFile);
00364             }
00365         }
00366         else
00367         {
00368             if(!Silent)
00369             {
00370                  if(wxMessageBox(wxT("Your license file doesn't exist. Do you want to abort the creation of the package?"), wxT("File Error...") , wxICON_ERROR|wxYES|wxNO) == wxID_YES)
00371                     return false;
00372                 else
00373                     RetVal = false;
00374             }
00375         }
00376     }
00377 
00378     TarStream.Close();
00379     if(!out.Close())
00380     {
00381         if(!Silent)
00382         {
00383             wxMessageBox(wxT("Error closing the tar stream"));
00384             RetVal = false;
00385         }
00386     }
00387 
00388     // Make the Bzip2 file
00389     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPak"));
00390     wxFileOutputStream bzout(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00391     wxBZipOutputStream bzfile(bzout,9);
00392 
00393     // Set the status in the UI
00394     if(!Silent && buildForm)
00395     {
00396         buildForm->WxStaticBox1->SetLabel(wxT(" Building Bzip2 archive... "));
00397         buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue() + 4);
00398     }
00399 
00400     TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("tar"));
00401     {
00402         wxFileInputStream InputFile(TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00403         wxTarInputStream TempTarStream(InputFile);
00404         if(!Silent && buildForm)
00405         {
00406             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetRange((InputFile.GetLength()/BufferSize)*2);
00407             buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue((InputFile.GetLength()/BufferSize));
00408         }
00409         char Buffer[BufferSize];
00410 
00411         while(!InputFile.Eof())
00412         {
00413             InputFile.Read(Buffer,BufferSize);
00414             bzfile.Write(Buffer,InputFile.LastRead());
00415             if(!Silent && buildForm)
00416             {
00417                 buildForm->WxGauge1->SetValue(buildForm->WxGauge1->GetValue()+1);
00418             }
00419         }
00420     }
00421     //Close bzfile file flushing remaining data
00422     bzfile.Close();
00423     bzout.Close();
00424     //Remove tar file
00425     if(!wxRemoveFile(TempFileName.GetFullPath()))
00426     {
00427         if(!Silent)
00428         {
00429             wxMessageBox(wxString(wxT("Couldn't remove temporary tar file named: ")) + TempFileName.GetFullPath());
00430             RetVal = false;
00431         }
00432     }
00433     // Sucess message
00434     if(!Silent)
00435     {
00436         TempFileName.SetExt(wxT("DevPak"));
00437         wxMessageBox(wxString(wxT("Your Dev-C++ Package has been successfully created to ")) +
00438         TempFileName.GetFullPath() + wxT(". It is now ready for testing and distribution."), wxT("Success"),
00439         wxICON_INFORMATION|wxOK);
00440     }
00441     return RetVal;
00442 }
